stories.text:
A friend did not have 2FA on his Instagram account and it’s been hacked and taken over by somebody hawking bitcoin.

He’s tried going through Facebook’s help centre to get back control of the account, but hasn’t been able to speak to anybody to move the case forward.

Any advice on what he can do to regain control of his account? Thanks!
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you get a hacked Instagram account back?
The Unbearable Bleakness of American Schooling

stories.text:
There are lots of smart people in this community who are deeply specialised in all sorts of domains.

I'll bet there are some fascinating counter-consensus views at the edges on what the future holds in these domains.

Let's hear them!

What do you think is true in your domain that most of your peers don't?
stories.title: Ask HN: What are your contrarian views?
Answering an Age Old Mystery: How Do Birds Fly?
Earth Could Surpass Ability of Ecosystems to Recover from Warming
